articles.title: What Prince George, Louis and Princess Charlotte wore for family Christmas card - Daily Mail
articles.description: In the Christmas card snap, the Prince and Princess of Wales' family can be seen in co-ordinated navy outfits from  some of their favourite brands.
articles.content:
Prince George and Princess Charlotte showed they are following in their mother's footsteps with a love of high street fashion as they appeared in this year's family Christmas card.
